metadata.title: CVE-2009-3583 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the Preferences menu item inSQL-Ledger 2.8.24 allows remote attackers to include and execute arbitrarylocal files via a .. (dot dot) in the countrycode field.

criterions.comment: sql-ledger: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
